channel.title: nk on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in nk on Barefoot Rob

item.title: another NK missile whizzes over Hokkaido
item.description: 08:30 Friday 15 September 2017 JST https://www.cnbc.com/2017/09/14/north-korea-may-have-launched-a-missile-according-to-reports.html https://www.reddit.com/r/worldnews/comments/705kaz/north_korea_may_have_launched_a_missile_according/ J: top Reddit post .. what do people say in Toyko when this happens? me: “Yay we are on Reddit!” J: glad nothing happened and ya’ll are safe though, for real.. just wondering what people say there to each other when close calls like this happen me: tbh, some people got notifications via cellphone.. but I don’t hear people talking about it.
